column4: i've got a problem setting up my netgear router. i believe the router is 255.255.255.0 and my computer (ubuntu Hardy 8.4) is looking for 255.255.255.255 ?
is that something i can call tech support back for, or something i need to set in my computer(s) ?
255.255.255.0 is your netmask more than likely, not the ip of the router
the ip of the router is probably 192.168.0.1
